name: address
script: CREATE OR REPLACE TYPE address AS OBJECT(street char(20), city char(20), state char(2), zip char(5));

grants.script: GRANT SELECT ON address TO public;

name: order_item_list
script: CREATE OR REPLACE TYPE order_item_list IS TABLE OF UNKNOWN;

grants.script: GRANT DEBUG, EXECUTE ON shop.order_item_list TO public;

name: employee
script: CREATE TYPE employee AS OBJECT(id NUMBER, name VARCHAR2(50), salary NUMBER, manager NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION employee(p_employee_id NUMBER, p_employee_name VARCHAR2, p_salary NUMBER) RETURN SELF AS RESULT), MEMBER PROCEDURE insert_records, MEMBER PROCEDURE display_records);

grants.script: GRANT SELECT ON employee TO public;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON employee TO user1;
